# Education and qualifications

```{r orcid, eval = F}
orcid_data <- rorcid::orcid_educations("0000-0002-6450-617X")$`0000-0002-6450-617X`

orcid_data$`education-summary` %>%
  select(`role-title`,
  `start-date.year.value`,
  `end-date.year.value`,
  organization.name, 
  organization.address.city) %>% 
  dput()
```

```{r, results = "asis"}
education <- structure(list(`role-title` = c("Ph.D. Mechanical Engineering", 
"Ph.D. Mechanical Engineering", "Graduate Certificate in Scientific Computing", 
"M.S. Mechanical Engineering", "B.S. Mechanical Engineering"), 
    `start-date.year.value` = c("2012", "2012", "2012", "2012", 
    "2008"), `end-date.year.value` = c("2016", "2016", "2014", 
    "2014", "2012"), organization.name = c("Ecole des Mines de Saint-Etienne", 
    "University of Florida", "University of Florida", "University of Florida", 
    "University of Florida"), organization.address.city = c("Saint-Etienne", 
    "Gainesville", "Gainesville", "Gainesville", "Gainesville"
    )), class = "data.frame", row.names = c(NA, 5L))

education %>%
  detailed_entries(
    what = `role-title`,
    when = glue::glue("{`start-date.year.value`} - {`end-date.year.value`}"),
    with = organization.name,
    where = organization.address.city
  )
```


# Experience

```{r}
tribble(
  ~start, ~end, ~position, ~employer, ~city, ~region, ~country,
  "2011/05/01", "2012/05/01", "Undergraduate Research Assistant", 
  "University of Florida", "Gainesville", "Florida", "US",
  "2010/08/01", "2011/01/01", "Launch Engineer Intern", 
  "SpaceX", "Cape Canveral", "Florida", "US",
  "2005/01/01", "2010/07/31", "Engineer Intern", "E&S Consulting, Inc.", 
  "St. Augustine", "Florida", "US") %>% 
  mutate(start = as.Date(start),
         end = as.Date(end)) %>%
  detailed_entries(
    what = position,
    when = glue("{year(start)} - {year(end)}"),
    with = employer,
    where = glue("{city}, {region}, {country}")
  )
```
